model

Class Filehandling

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Filehandling

  • public class Filehandling
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the file opened and loaded by the Filechooser in JavaFX. The read data is added into an ArrayList by the type String, and the String ArrayList is used to create an patternFormat object.
    Author:
    Ali Arfan, Kent Erlend Bratteng Knudsen, Stian Tornholm Grimsgaard
    See Also:
    FileChooser, PatternFormat

    • Method Detail

      • getFilePattern

        public PatternFormat getFilePattern()
        getFilePattern 
        public PatternFormat getFilePattern()

        Returns the PaternFormat object, where the read data from the RLE file is set to pattern.

        Returns:
        pattern - The RLE data read for the opened file.

      • readGameBoard

        public void readGameBoard(java.io.BufferedReader br)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          PatternFormatException,
                          java.net.MalformedURLException,
                          java.nio.charset.MalformedInputException
        readGameBoard 
        public void readGameBoard(BufferedReader br)

        Reads each line in the file, and adds it to the String ArrayList, the data read is added at the end of the array.

        Parameters:
        br - - Takes a BufferedReader as an parameter
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if the gameboard cannot be read or file does not exists.
        PatternFormatException - - if there was an error loading the RLE file.
        java.net.MalformedURLException - - when a malformed URL has occurred.
        java.nio.charset.MalformedInputException - - when an input byte sequence is not legal for given charset.

      • readGameBoardFromDisk

        public void readGameBoardFromDisk(java.nio.file.Path path)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  PatternFormatException,
                                  java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException,
                                  java.nio.charset.MalformedInputException
        readGameBoardFromDisk 
        public void readGameBoardFromDisk(Path path)

        Opens and read the RLE file from the disk.

        Parameters:
        path - - Path of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if the gameboard cannot be read or file does not exists.
        PatternFormatException - - if there was an error loading the RLE file.
        java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException - - thrown when an attempt is made to access a file that does not exist.
        java.nio.charset.MalformedInputException - - when an input byte sequence is not legal for given charset.

      • readGameBoardFromURL

        public void readGameBoardFromURL(java.lang.String url)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 PatternFormatException,
                                 java.net.MalformedURLException
        readGameBoardFromURL 
        public void readGameBoardFromURL(String url)

        Opens and reads the URL of the RLE file.

        Parameters:
        url - - Internet URL containing the URL file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - I/O exception of some sort has occurred.
        PatternFormatException - - thrown when the RLE file is incorret.
        java.net.MalformedURLException - - no legal protocol could be found in a specification string or the string could not be parsed.
